title: Hole in Sunak's Pradas
itunes:title: Hole in Sunak's Pradas
description:
Rishi Sunak said to be wearing out his shoes to convince Conservative members to elect him leader but Bloomberg's Therese Raphael tells Caroline Hepker and Lizzy Burden it looks unlikely. The NHS wait list will be the biggest test for the next Prime Minister not the immediate cost of living crisis. Plus Bloomberg's Senior UK economist Dan Hanson and Senior Executive Editor David Merritt discuss the troubling state of the UK economy and consumer sentiment. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
